sections.title: Welcome to Dinosaur Play Group!
sections.subtitle: Roar into adventure and learning
sections.name: Homepage Hero
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Experience the prehistoric adventure of learning and fun at Dinosaur Play Group. Our community-driven play space is designed to inspire the imaginations of young explorers and help them learn through engaging, hands-on activities.

images.name: Dinosaur Park Image
images.description: A vibrant image showcasing children playing among lifelike dinosaur models.

sections.title: About Us
sections.subtitle: Our Story and Mission
sections.name: About Us Section
sections.label: About
sections.content: Established in 2020, Dinosaur Play Group was inspired by a love for dinosaurs and a passion for early childhood education. We aim to create a safe, fun, and educational environment where children can explore and grow. Our mission is to foster creativity, curiosity, and collaboration through play and exploration.

images.name: Mission Infographic
images.description: Infographic describing the mission and values of Dinosaur Play Group.

sections.title: Our Adventures
sections.subtitle: A World of Prehistoric Fun
sections.name: Services Section
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
### Daily Dinosaur Expeditions  
Join us every day for themed adventures that blend learning with fun. Our activities include:

* **Fossil Hunts**: Dig for fossils in our excavation sandbox.  
* **Dino Arts & Crafts**: Create your own dinosaur-themed masterpiece.  
* **Storytime in the Jurassic**: Enjoy thrilling tales of dinosaurs and adventure.  
* **Dino Dance Party**: Groove and move like your favorite dino creatures.

sections.title: Testimonials
sections.subtitle: Hear from Our Happy Explorers
sections.name: Testimonials Section
sections.label: Testimonials
sections.content:
"Dinosaur Play Group is an incredible experience for my children! They learn so much and always leave with a smile." – **Megan R.**  

"I love how every day holds a new adventure. The staff are caring, and the atmosphere is perfect for my little explorers." – **Jonathan K.**

images.name: Family Photo
images.description: A happy family posing with dinosaur models at the play group.

sections.title: Get in Touch
sections.subtitle: Connect with Us Today
sections.name: Contact Section
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
We’d love to hear from you! Whether you're curious about our program or want to schedule a visit, feel free to reach out.  

**Address**: 123 Dino Drive, Fossilville  
**Phone**: (555) 123-4567  
**Email**: contact@dinosaurplaygroup.com
